sentence.Network_en: Gold and silver are tractable metals.
sentence.Network_cn: 金和银是容易加工的金属.

sentence.Network_en: He could easily manage his tractable and worshipping younger brother.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能轻而易举地管住听话并且崇拜自己的弟弟。

sentence.Network_en: Carrie seemed quite tractable, and he congratulated himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 嘉莉看上去很温顺, 他暗自感到庆幸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... redoubtable 可敬畏的，可怕的 tractable 易于驾御的，温顺的 intractable 倔强的，难管的.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程（八）_在线英语听力室 ... trace n. 痕迹；v.跟踪，追溯 tractable adj. 温顺的；易驾驭的 tragedy n. 悲剧.
GRE填空单词之精简版 --外语频道--中国教育在线 ... thwart a. 横放的 tractable a. 易于管教的 unchanging adj. 不变的; 恒常的.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... tractability 温顺 tractable 易于驾驭的，温顺的 tragedy 悲剧，惨事，灾难.

list.abs: This approach helps to make the issues more tractable ., 这种方法有助于使这些问题更便于处理.
fixed parameter tractable algorithms for the two variants of the vertex covering problem顶点覆盖变体问题的确定参数可解算法研究
mathematical tractability 便于数学处理 portability 便于携带 ease-to-learn 便于学习的 slack suit 便装 pass 遍 pantothenic acid 遍多酸 exclusive process 遍举.
Triangular matrices , in particular , are usually quite tractable ., 特别地 , 三角矩阵常是十分易于驾驭的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin tractabilis, from tractare 'to handle' (see tractate)

entry.tran: 驯服的;温顺的;易驾驭的;易处理的
entry.def: If you say that a person, problem, or device is tractable, you mean that they can be easily controlled or dealt with.

example.ex: He could easily manage his tractable and worshipping younger brother.
example.tran: 他能轻而易举地管住听话并且崇拜自己的弟弟。
该国最难解决的社会问题

means.word_mean: 1. easily managed (controlled or taught or molded);

sentences.sentence: "the natives...being...of an intelligent tractable disposition"- Samuel Butler

means.word_mean: 2. readily reacting to suggestions and influences;

auth_sentence.content: Bulls which had always been tractable suddenly turned savage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bulls which had always been tractable suddenly turned savage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bulls which had always been tractable suddenly turned savage.

auth_sentence.content: Thoroughly tractable men trained from boyhood to endure hours of stupefying memorization.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thoroughly tractable men trained from boyhood to endure hours of stupefying memorization.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thoroughly tractable men trained from boyhood to endure hours of stupefying memorization.

auth_sentence.content: The least tractable problem is that the incentives for genetic discrimination can run deep.
auth_sentence.res_content: The least tractable problem is that the incentives for genetic discrimination can run deep.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The least tractable problem is that the incentives for genetic discrimination can run deep.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的

sentences.en: Gold and silver are tractable metals.
sentences.cn: 金和银是容易加工的金属。
